titles.title: A resolution to commend the United States Coast Guard for its recent heroic action in the rescue of 37 Soviet crew members.

calendar.text: Submitted in the Senate. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 88.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/9/1987--Introduced. Commends the U.S. Coast Guard for its courage and skill shown in the dangerous rescue of 37 Russian crew members from the Soviet freighter Komsomolets on March 14, 1987.
